citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:15 PM on 24-
MAY-2023. Inspector knocked on the doors, called phone numbers on file, and waited 30 minutes.
End Section
